comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://youtube.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fyoutube.com) ### Comment > I have paid for adguard, advance protection to block advanced YouTube ads, and I am still receiving ads on the YouTube iOS app. I have enabled everything in the Safari settings, and in the AdGuard app I have updated the rules. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/jUGyZPW.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard/AdGuard Pro for iOS v4.4.4 Browser: | YouTube iOS DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

issue.title: bdnews24.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for iOS

### AdGuard version

4.4.4

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://bdnews24.com/education/ga09nk1i76

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

In main webpage bdnews24.com
There’s a whitespace at top 

![43E44D02-5F9D-4641-A05E-3ADDFFD55A6D](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/46019727/204418830-ca79ec27-95d9-4de6-844c-efa0e461f0f0.png)

And there are two leftovers at bottom of every article

![BC561CFF-72C7-458C-9B2A-838F8020AAA0](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/46019727/204418895-a43e8c90-1825-4864-b924-945dd49628be.png)


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
@zloyden sir in main page now there are two whitebox at top
Bdnews24.com
